Summary: A little orb red with white glow. It was just floating in the sky.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Berkeley Springs
There were no other sightings in Berkeley Springs on or around January 15th 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Details1.I was walkin down to my oms house. 2.I always look up at the sky at night. 3.I know it was a UFO. I see them several times a week. 4.It was a red orb with a white glow.An it floated across the sky like a wishy... 5.I was happy, excited, and warm. Mind you I am in the mountains it is freezing here. 6. It looked to have dimmed out, but was also getting further away from me. I also see just white orbs. They look like stars but float or zoom across the sky. Didnt know this site was here. I will be logging them in here for now on.
